startingPosition.instruction: Lie flat on the back. Legs together and straight. Arms by the sides and palms down. Head, neck and spine in a straight line.

technique.instruction: Inhaling raise the right leg straight up at 90 degree, foot relaxed. Other leg should remain straight and in contact with the floor. Hold for 3 to 5 seconds, retaining the breath.
Exhaling slowly lower the right leg to the floor.
Inhaling and raise the left leg straight up at 90 degree, foot relaxed. Other leg should remain straight and in contact with the floor. Hold for 3 to 5 seconds, retaining the breath.
Exhaling and slowly lower the left leg to the floor.
Inhaling raise the both legs straight up at 90 degree, foot relaxed. Hold for 3 to 5 seconds, retaining the breath.
Exhaling slowly lower both the legs to the floor.

info: Deep breathing should be done and movement should be in sync with the breathing.
Gently push out the abdomen with inhalation and exhaling return to the starting position. Repeat 5 times.
